prod_short_desc: Perfect your Spinjitzu skills with LEGO® NINJAGO™ Zane, the Ninja of Ice!
prod_long_desc:
Bolster your LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ gameplay with the buildable Zane Fun Pack. Place the Ninja of Ice on the LEGO Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then deploy his Spinjitzu skills and other special abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies in true Ninja style. Add the 3-in-1 NinjaCopter to boost your gameplay, and rebuild it into a Glaciator and Freeze Fighter for upgraded in-game abilities. Includes a buildable Zane minifigure with his 2 golden shurikens.
Includes a buildable Zane minifigure with his 2 golden shurikens and 3-in-1 NinjaCopter, both with a detachable LEGO® Toy Tag.
Rebuild the 3-in-1 NinjaCopter into a Glaciator and Freeze Fighter for upgraded in-game abilities.
Place Zane and his 3-in-1 vehicle on the LEGO® Toy Pad and set out on exciting in-game adventures.
Activate Zane's special Acrobat, Spinjitzu, Stealth, Boomerang, Dive and X-Ray Vision abilities to solve puzzles and battle enemies.
Collect your favorite LEGO®DIMENSIONS™ characters and use them in-game together for a crazy mash-up multiverse.
Visit LEGO.com/dimensions for more information on this exciting LEGO® building and video-gaming experience.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ Starter Pack and internet connection required.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ expansion packs unlock additional content.
LEGO® DIMENSIONS™ characters and vehicles are required to interact with the LEGO DIMENSIONS video game.
NinjaCopter measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide (alternative 3-in-1 vehicle builds vary in size).
